Scriptal.Name: Mark As Target
Scriptal.Description: Displays a Quest Target marker on the Game Object. Accepts both GameObjectIds and GameObject Names. Note: For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. Note: This operation is purely visual and does not handle actual target logic.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempGameObjectIdVal = |[1|STRING,NUMBER]| if type(tempGameObjectIdVal) == "string" then tempGameObjectIdVal = GetGameObjectId(tempGameObjectIdVal) end TppMarker.EnableQuestTargetMarker(tempGameObjectIdVal) TppSoundDaemon.PostEvent"sfx_s_enemytag_quest_tgt"

Choice.Name: Game Object
Choice.Description: The soldier, hostage, etc. to be visually marked as the target.
